title: Diary, reminiscences, and correspondence of Henry Crabb Robinson ...
author: Robinson, Henry Crabb
snippet: March 1st — (On circuit.) We dined with Garrow.

title: Diary, reminiscences, and correspondence of Henry Crabb Robinson ...
author: Robinson, Henry Crabb
snippet: Garrow sat down, but cross-examined at great length another witness.

title: Diary, reminiscences, and correspondence of Henry Crabb Robinson ...
author: Robinson, Henry Crabb

title: Diary, reminiscences, and correspondence of Henry Crabb Robinson ...
author: Robinson, Henry Crabb
snippet: My vivacity in conversation  pleased him, and others like him entertained the very false notion that the gift of w^ords is the main requisite for a barrister,  — a vulgar error, which the marvellous success of such men as Erskine and Garrow had encouraged.
